bibl.title: Socjologiczna lektura planów eremów egipskich mnichów z V-VII w. [Sociological reading of the plans of Egyptian monks' hermitages from 5th-7th centuries.]
bibl.note: Monastic archaeology in Egypt has made, on the basis of written sources, very essential corrections in the picture of monks' life, particularly those from smaller communities who built their own hermitages. If plans were drawn after excavations, they are enough to tell us a lot about monks' social origin, their number, social hierarchy governing their life, mentality. Analysis of some chosen sites (Esna, Kellia, Naqlun). - Avec résumés en polonais et en anglais.
